archimate:BusinessProcess.name: PIM.3.BP1 Establish commitment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Commitment is established to support the process group, to provide resources and further enablers (trainings, methods, infrastructure, etc.) to sustain improvement actions. NOTE 1: The process improvement process is a generic process, which can be used at all levels (e.g. organizational level, process level, project level, etc.) and which can be used to improve all other processes. NOTE 2: Commitment at all levels of management may support process improvement. Personal goals may be set for the relevant managers to enforce management commitment.
